entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023
